sentences.text: Im a little bit jealous that youve had the opportunity to visit the Holy Land! This a response to some of the weirder or less rational responses Ive seen: you can make the argument that the 2nd Amendment was meant for a militia with one shot guns, but you are also forgetting something: to allow the citizenry to arm themselves for their own uses is a sign of solemn trust, that our society can regulate and condition itself in the proper use and handling and responsibility of owning and using a firearm, whether it shoots one or a thousand bullets.

sentences.ctext: Im a little bit jealous that youve had the opportunity to visit the Holy Land! This a response to some of the weirder or less rational responses Ive seen: you can make the argument that the 2nd Amendment was meant for a militia with one shot guns, but you are also forgetting something: to allow the citizenry to arm themselves for their own uses is a sign of solemn trust, that our society can regulate and condition itself in the proper use and handling and responsibility of owning and using a firearm, whether it shoots one or a thousand bullets.

sentences.text: And what is a militia but a group of volunteers, mostly free citizens, who band together for mutual defense using their own weapons? With the rise of crime and the lack of respect and accountability to the law, do you actually think that banning guns will solve anything? How about bringing back a culture of responsibility and accountability, or just plain virtue, back to society? How about punishing those who commit crimes like Newton or other atrocities instead of making excuses for them and punishing society at large? THAT makes a lot more sense to me.

sentences.ctext: 2-At the time the 2nd Amendmant was written the guns were muskets, one shot at a time, not the sophisticated assault weapons that shoot dozens of rounds within a second and can kill indiscriminantly (as was in Newtown).

sentences.text: 3-What self defense mesaure or sort of activity needs clips that hold dozens of rounds? 4-Unscrupulous gun manufacturers have learned to work around every assault rifle ban to justify these people-killers 5-If Lanza had not shot himself when he saw the police come at him, he would have killed a number of policemen as well becuase his weapons were much more sophisticated than those of the police.

sentences.text: Besides the important two points you raise, gun control for sophisticated weapons should have no loopholes.

sentences.text: Dec 21, 2012 - 01:48 PM My dear Niece Eleina Trilby Dec 21, 2012 - 01:38 PM I appreciate your sensible search to improve Americas situation with guns- which Id hope everyone can agree is very broken given how easily people with mental illness or criminal backgrounds can acquire military-style assault weapons, hand guns, and body armor.

sentences.text: However, I would like to suggest you rethink the idea that the NRA (and most people) have about the 2nd amendment and think it was intended by the Founders to give individual citizens the right to own private firearms outside of state military service.
